text:
my photo doesnt do this watch justice, take a look at these studio shots:

[https://horasminutosysegundos.com/media/k2/galleries/4577/IWC\_Pilot\_Racing\_Green\_002.jpg](https://horasminutosysegundos.com/media/k2/galleries/4577/IWC_Pilot_Racing_Green_002.jpg)

[https://revistaq.mx/wp-content/uploads/2018/11/Modelo-del-Reloj-de-Aviador-Crono%CC%81grafo-Edicio%CC%81n-Latinoame%CC%81rica.jpg](https://revistaq.mx/wp-content/uploads/2018/11/Modelo-del-Reloj-de-Aviador-Crono%CC%81grafo-Edicio%CC%81n-Latinoame%CC%81rica.jpg)

Hi all, please don't judge this watch prematurely based on my crappy photo. Here're some high quality studio shots of this watch and I think it does it justice:

[https://revistaq.mx/wp-content/uploads/2018/11/Modelo-del-Reloj-de-Aviador-Crono%CC%81grafo-Edicio%CC%81n-Latinoame%CC%81rica.jpg](https://revistaq.mx/wp-content/uploads/2018/11/Modelo-del-Reloj-de-Aviador-Crono%CC%81grafo-Edicio%CC%81n-Latinoame%CC%81rica.jpg)

[https://horasminutosysegundos.com/media/k2/galleries/4577/IWC\_Pilot\_Racing\_Green\_002.jpg](https://horasminutosysegundos.com/media/k2/galleries/4577/IWC_Pilot_Racing_Green_002.jpg)

and yes, 43mm is definitely too big for my wrist and the shot angle made it look worse than it actually is...
